__TOC__



This page lays out the cadence schedule and targeted testcases for each week during the Raring cycle. It will be updated as the cycle unfolds.

See <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cadence|this page]]</nowiki> for an explanation on cadence testing.

=== How-to use the schedule ===
Find the current cadence testing week and click the link. Inside you'll find links to the tracker that contains milestones and testcases for you to submit results against. Follow the tests and submit your results. Need help learning how to submit results and use the tracker? <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/QATracker|Start here]]</nowiki>.

=== Links ===
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RaringRingtail/ReleaseSchedule|Raring Release Schedule]]</nowiki>
